#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
 
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define For(i,a,b) for(int i=a-1;i>=0;i--)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define L 400
#define ll long long
#define s1(a) scanf("%d",&a);
#define s2(a) scanf("%lld",&a);
#define s3(a,b) scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
#define s4(a,b,c) scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&c);
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define F first
#define S second 
/*******************************MAIN CODE STARTS*******************************/

ll k,n;

ll powr(ll s,ll p,ll K)
{
	if(p==0)
		return 1;	
 
	if(p%2==1)
	{
		ll q=powr(s,p/2,K);
		ll a=q;
		q=(a*a);
		if(q>=K)
			q%=K;
		q=(q*s);
		if(q>=K)
			q%=K;	
		return ( q );
	}
 
	else
	{
		ll q=powr(s,p/2,K);
		ll a=q;
		q=(a*a);
		if(q>=K)
			q%=K;	
		return (q);
	}
}

void scan()
{
	s3(k,n)
}

void out()
{
	//cout<<fib(n-1)<<'\n';
	if(n==1)
		cout<<1<<'\n';
	else if(n==2)
		cout<<k<<'\n';
	else
		cout<<powr(k,powr(2,n-3,MOD-1),MOD)<<'\n';
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	s1(t)
	while(t--)
	{
		scan();
		out();
	}
	return 0;
}
